title: The superstructure did not fall from the sky (placement on issues raised by the confrontation for the marriage of homosexual couples and criticism of the KKE positions)

For the positions of the KKE

The multi -page text that the KKE released to 'The positions of the KKE for the political marriage of homosexual couples and its impact on children's rights » he's got receives many reviews. There are a few who accuse it of homophobia And racism because it disagrees with the political marriage of homosexual couples. Is a one Wrong criticism. The KKE neither despises nor hosters homosexuals, Lesbians, generally people with non -heterosexual sexual orientation. Rightly characterizes the leadership of the LGBTKI "self -proclaimed" and exercises her criticism of the sack of people with different class interests but False lumps all the collectives of LGBTKI. He's the same forgot the Class analysis when talking about marriage and family, parents and children. Its placement is purely systemic. In fact, he possessed by himself moral panic that characterizes bourgeoisie when he feels that the threatened her social standards.

The KKE mentions two reasons why he disagrees with their political marriage homosexual couples. The first and the basic, as he writes, is the further commercialization of childbirth and childbirth (adoption). It is about for excuse. It is such the size of the commercialization that already exists with the heterosexual couples, which the homosexuals, much less in number, will simply They are apparently in ready -made circuits. Many will fall victim to Aetonians, as the heterosexuals fall.

THE second reason, 'Equally basic and interconnected ', is that "The child's social right to the relationship of maternity is bypassed - paternity, as an evolving Biococal relationship. " The following excerpt is characteristic: ' The more man evolves socially, the more More consciously he must also face individual responsibility in childbirth, to realize his responsibility for the new life, which is objectively Dependent of parents and especially the mother for a significant time space. The exclusion of human - social maternity means that Maternity is removed as conquering the long development of man » . In short, he refers to classic urban conservative position how destination of It is a human being to give birth and how childbirth is an individual responsibility. Disintegrates the concepts of paternity and maternity from their class trunk when he claims how "They are registered with the kind of man."

To his attempt to justify his attitude towards homosexual couples resorted to psychology to prove that he cannot balance a Child easily if he does not have his natural parents. Does not hesitate to reverse the reality by saying that "exists The contribution of both parents to the upbringing of children as a trend » as a result of the formally common right of man and woman at work and of the Progressive changes in law! Argues that "As long as the economic motive of marriage is weakened, as long as it rests and relying on more in the free choice of cohabitation (especially for the working -class, folk forces), both in the core of marriage remains a necessity only the Institutional arrangement of common parental care » . So as the KKE, we should believe the solution to the female issue has been launched!

The family in capitalism

The homosexual couples have the right to marriage and the ability to do family. The point is not to justify marriage and family. Why the marriage does not complete the happiness of two people loved, because it is a Convention with the state on an economic basis, because vows of eternal love are infected with selfishness. Fortunately there is the divorce that can cut off the His lifelong bond, if needed. Family can exist without marriage, without Children, with adolescent children, with only one parent, with same -sex parents, with the A woman older than the man (another taboo and that!)…

THE Family is the cell of society, they say. She educates the child, It lays the foundations on which every person's personality will be built. When She is sick, all society is sick. In contrast to this dominant narrative, Marxism makes it clear that family is not the cell that lays the society but its derivative. Is part of the superstructure, affects and adapts to society, changes from season to season, evolves to course of centuries. Its evolution is determined by the economic relationships that exist at the given level of production. Always holds two features that appeared with the individual property. Its monogamy and lower position woman within the one who also have different appearances depending on the time.

THE Family is one of the two axes of the woman's double oppression. In most countries laws do not discriminate against her but the Her oppression in the family remains. Even when he works and has Economic independence is still the slave of the house. Serve him man, do all the unholy household jobs and is responsible for the Care of children.

'The family must cease to is financial unit to cease to be on the basis of female oppression ', said the Engels. Economic Unit does not It means that the motive of marriage is financial. Marriage, which is the legal recognition of the family by the state is the basic institution through whose individual property issues are regulated. Her heritage Land and means of production make marriage a necessary economic necessity. That is why it has been and is up to date "The institutional matrix of childbirth". The Children are natural heirs. Housing, child care, the Education and health of its members are some of the financial duties that The family is borne. The state itself treats the family as Economic unit, through it, regulates many issues of economic policy.

THE family differs from class to class. Material conditions shape their its terms of operation. The bourgeois woman though in a lower position than the man bourgeois is not burdened with oppression at work, as opposed to her wife working class and petty bourgeoisie. The wealth and power of bourgeois, the poverty of workers and the unfulfilled "dreams" of petty bourgeois in the relationships between members of a family.

Each family reproduces the dominant ideology with which it is educated and educate its members. Not only the urban but also a family of working class, is a producer of the dominant ideology that is embedded in From how it operates, from reproduction of oppressive patterns. The bourgeois want the popular family to produce their future servants, for they use whatever mechanism they have to control the education of the Children. The media and social media have a special weight nowadays Networking showing to strike parents, priests and teachers who are moaning that their role is being discredited. School, family and Church remain the most sturdy reproduction institutions of the dominant Ideology.

Each form of family Either we identify it on the basis of the class in which belong to its members (hardworking, urban, etc.) either in the form of the form (nuclear, single parent, expanded etc) either based on gender (homosexual or heterosexual) closes in it all the contradictions that are widely developed in society and state .

Parents and children

Three Characteristics of class society, the inequality, the property and the power, penetrate as ideas on all aspects of social activity, in all human relationships and are deeply rooted in the family. Love Among its members does not negate the fact that their relationships are unequal and oppressive. "I love you" hides "you belong to me". The man He owns the woman and the parents of children's owners.

The children are considered awkward creatures to be constantly under surveillance. The good and their evil are known by others and first of all of all their parents. The newborn's physical weakness and the child's need for Care by adults, it creates a distorted image of childhood. 'Children do not belong to their parents Not even in the state but to themselves » , said Kroupskaya. In Capitalism This position is inconceivable. For the child who is not recognized No autonomy, there are either parents or institution. This situation looks completely natural. The experience of socialist construction in the Soviet Union, Particularly the conclusions from the cultural revolution raised the issue of Child on a new basis. The socialization of domestic work allowed the children not systematically depend on their mother for their daily problems. Without stopping parents dealing with their children, the Socialist society supported children as a whole. In simple words, the answers on a number of issues related to education, upbringing, Curator and adoption in the context of capitalism contain all errors of the social system.

Today, Those who shudder with the marriage of homosexual couples invoke the Child Rights. They cannot and do not want to see beyond capitalist system. The KKE in its attempt not to identify with the urban reactive standards and the darkness of the church claims that Progressive changes in the law and work of the woman have balanced the roles of mother and father in raising children. This is not apply. Mother is burdened with daily care of children, deals with almost exclusively with their progress at school and with education their. When the woman has children radically changes her life and enters into New base its relationship with work. When the man becomes a father not similar upheavals are observed. Family in capitalism oppresses the A woman who in turn oppresses children and oppresses them. THE release of a woman by the child, leads to overthrow her role maternity and paternity and ends up in the liberation of his own Child. Woman cannot earn equality with men, if not at the same time raise the issue of overthrowing the oppressive relationship of parents to children.

THE Socialist society is the environment where the family will be removed with Form we know and will be on a new basis for human relationships. The The superstructure has proven very hard. It will take many cultural revolutions.
